meanings: (사물·장소 등을) find, look (for), search (for), hunt (for), (formal) seek; (위치를) locate; (되찾다) recover
(사람을) find, look (for), search (for), hunt (for); (호출하다) want, ask for
(방문하다) visit, call (in/on), look sb up, (informal) drop by, (informal) drop in (on)

examples.korean: They are looking into ways of invigorating the department. 발음듣기 그들은 그 부서를 활성화할 방안을 찾고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They are looking into ways of invigorating the department. 발음

examples.korean: He was scrabbling for a foothold on the steep slope. 발음듣기 그는 그 가파른 비탈에서 허우적거리며 발 디딜 곳을 찾고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was scrabbling for a foothold on the steep slope. 발음

examples.korean: We were looking for a place to eat. 발음듣기 우리는 식사할 곳을 찾고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were looking for a place to eat. 발음

examples.korean: He’s after a job at our place. 발음듣기 그는 우리 회사에서 일자리를 찾고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s after a job at our place. 발음

examples.korean: I’m looking for a flat share. 발음듣기 저는 다른 사람들과[여러 세입자가] 함께 쓰는 연립주택을 찾고 있어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m looking for a flat share. 발음
